DOC.HEAD: With AM-Panama Bjt
Eds: Updates throughout with later info.
DOC.TEXT: Here is a brief summary of events in Panama: _U.S. troops attacked Panamanian Defense Forces bases, capturing or dispersing most PDF troops. U.S. forces appeared to have gained control but fighting continued. _President Bush said in a televised address he ordered American troops into action ``to protect the lives of American citizens in Panama and bring Gen. Manuel Antonio Noriega to justice in the United States.'' _Noriega was not captured and was in hiding. The United States $1 million for information leading to his capture. _Fifteen American servicemen and one American civilian were reported killed. One hospital reported at least 52 other people died. _Hostages were reportedly taken from the Marriott Hotel by Panamanian paramilitary troops. It was unclear how many were captured and whether all were released. _Opposition leader Guillermo Endara was sworn in as president. The United States recognized his government. The Organization of American States refused. _Most members of Congress in both parties supported the action. _The Soviet Union condemned the attack as a violation of international law.
